name: 10th Planet Hobart Pinball
description:
Welcome to 10th Planet Hobart pinball! Hold down space to charge the launcher, then let it go to begin the game (the longer you hold it down the faster the pinball will launch), then use the A and L keys to control the left and right flippers. 

Master the warm ups by activating all 8 simultaneously to be promoted! 

For more information about 10th Planet Hobart or no-gi jiu jitsu visit www.10thplanethobart.com

To get in touch you can find me on Facebook as Dr Ninja, Twitter as @andrew_mendlik and Instagram as iamdoctorninja.

Enjoy!
